General.Name: Joeone Co Ltd
General.Description: Joeone Co., Ltd. produces and sells men's business casual wear in China. It offers men's pants, jackets, shirts, T-shirts and suits under the Jiumuwang, ZIOZIA, and FUN brand. The company is headquartered in Quanzhou, China. JOEONE Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiu Muwang International Investment Holdings Co., Ltd.

4.Name: Mr. Jingchun  Zhang
4.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Board Sec. & Director
